name: DatePicker
description: A calendar-based date selection component with range support, min/max constraints, and keyboard navigation

accessibility.screenReader: Current date announced. Navigation buttons announce month changes. Calendar grid announces date with weekday and selection state.

recommendedUsage: Use for selecting dates where calendar context is helpful. Use range mode for date ranges.
antiPatterns: Do not use for time-only selection - use TimePicker. Avoid for simple date entry where typing is preferred.
